game.name: GREX
game.shortDescription: Become a swarm. Think as one. Mutate. Multiply. Overwhelm. A roguelite auto-shooter built around hive-mind powers — craft broken builds, survive the chaos, crush enemies with sheer collective force! All to a thumping trance-techno soundtrack and neon-glow visuals.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a swarm. Think as one. Mutate. Multiply. Overwhelm. A roguelite auto-shooter built around hive-mind powers — craft broken builds, survive the chaos, crush enemies with sheer collective force! All to a thumping trance-techno soundtrack and neon-glow visuals.
